name: Nevans’ Custard Base
description:
Here is my custard base, tried and tested with several pairings and also the base of my “lemondowskii” recipe 

A rich thick vanilla custard that’s silky, smooth and sweet.

Really good off of a shake but gets better with time.

Add whatever you want to this, strawberry, blueberry, lemon, peanut butter, jams, ry4’s, tobacco, doughnuts... the possibilities are endless.

If you like what I do and this recipe please rate and review accordingly :)

If you struggle to get a hold of Custard Premium you can get it from chefs flavours right here:

https://chefsflavours.co.uk/custard-prem-flavourart/

And this is exactly the same... it just has a nickname ;)

https://chefsflavours.co.uk/custard-prem-flavour-creative/
author: Nickevz

reviews.text: Ordering 100ml of custard premium will mix and rate when I return..  2/23/20 update ok the Capella v1 is pretty much overpowering this recipe and now having tasted FA premium "HYPE" custard  it's nothing but TPA vanilla bean ice Cream with extra DAAP I think Capella v1 is still my number one favorite custard...

After 10 days steeping my opinion: Its not bad but its not good either. I enjoy many of your recipes but this is definitely not a base i would run into my recipes. FLV Vanilla Pudding is a weak and creamy like flavor for me and does not fit well in a custard. It turns custards more to a creamy vape like TFA Vanilla Swirl. Most of us know custards need time to steep. If it changes positively to a heavy and bold custard, ill edit this review.
